Package gtopinionminer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LemmaList
    The class provides a data structure to store the words surrounding a keyword and compute a sentiment that this keyword is likely to carry.
    Lemmatization
    The class creates a convenient method to use Mate is2.Lemmatizer for the German language.
    Lexicon
    The class provides a utility to query the sentiment dictionaries used in the tool.
    OpinionMiner
    The main class of the Opinion Miner Tool for German Tweets
    StopList
    The class stores a stoplist used in the preprocessing.
    Tokenization
    The class creates a convenient method to use Stanford NLP Tokenizer.
    Tweet  
    TweetLemma
